Name: Skeleton Troubles
About the game: Skeleton troubles Have you ever wondered what happens to all skeleton enemies in video games after they die? Now you have to experience it the hard way! Playing as the skeleton, collect bones and hearts scattered across different levels so that he can restore his power and resurrect again and teach all his enemies a lesson. Only the most agile and careful skeleton will be able to sneak past all the deadly traps and dangerous enemies on the way to the last level. Can you cope with this task? Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack
